title: DBMS Level 3 â€” Keys & Relational Model
concept: MCQs on super key, candidate key, primary key and foreign key.

challenges.title: Q1: Primary Key
challenges.description: Which of the following is true about a Primary Key?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) It can have duplicate values
b) It uniquely identifies a row and cannot be NULL
c) It is always a combination of two attributes
d) It must be a numeric attribute
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: Foreign Key
challenges.description: A Foreign Key is used to:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Enforce referential integrity between two tables
b) Store backup copy of primary key
c) Speed up search operations
d) Encrypt sensitive columns in a table
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
